mimlclassifier

Class MIMLEnsemble

  • java.lang.Object
    • mimlclassifier.MIMLClassifier
      • mimlclassifier.MIMLEnsemble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfiguration, java.io.Serializable, IMIMLClassifier, mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner

    public class MIMLEnsemble
extends MIMLClassifier
    Class implementing the MIMLkNN algorithm for MIML data.
    Version:
    20180717
    Author:
    Alvaro A. Belmonte, Eva Gibaja, Amelia Zafra
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sampleWithReplacement

        boolean sampleWithReplacement
        Determines whether the classifier will consider sampling with replacement. By default it is false

      • useConfidences

        Determines whether confidences [0,1] or relevance {0,1} is used to compute bipartition.

                    int numClassifiers)
        Constructor of the class. Its default setting is:@li sampleWithReplacement=false @li threshold=0.5
        Parameters:
        baseLearner - The base learner to be used
        numClassifiers - The number of base classifiers in the ensemble

    • Method Detail

      • buildInternal

        protected void buildInternal(MIMLInstances trainingSet)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: MIMLClassifier
        Learner specific implementation of building the model from MultiLabelInstances training data set. This method is called from MIMLClassifier.build(MultiLabelInstances) method, where behavior common across all learners is applied.
        Specified by:
        buildInternal in class MIMLClassifier
        Parameters:
        trainingSet - the training data set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if learner model was not created successfully.

      • makePredictionInternal

        protected mulan.classifier.MultiLabelOutput makePredictionInternal(Bag instance)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception,
                                                                   mulan.classifier.InvalidDataException
        Description copied from class: MIMLClassifier
        Learner specific implementation for predicting on specified data based on trained model. This method is called from MIMLClassifier.makePrediction(weka.core.Instance) which guards for model initialization and apply common handling/behavior.
        Specified by:
        makePredictionInternal in class MIMLClassifier
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to predict on.
        Returns:
        the output of the learner for the given instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while making the prediction.
        mulan.classifier.InvalidDataException - if specified instance data is invalid and can not be processed by the learner.

      • resample

        public static weka.core.Instances resample(weka.core.Instances data,
                                           double percentage,
                                           boolean sampleWithReplacement,
                                           int seed)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Obtains a sample of the original data.
        Parameters:
        data - Instances with the dataset
        percentage - percentage of instances that will contain the new dataset
        sampleWithReplacement - If true the sample will be with replacement
        seed - Seed for randomization. Necessary if instances have not been previously shuffled with randomize
        Returns:
        Instances
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - To be handled
